meanings.sent1: The unciliated surface of the cell was smooth.
meanings.sent2: The unciliated skin felt soft to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The unciliated plant looked like a sleek marble sculpture.
meanings.sent4: Her unciliated hair shone in the sunlight like polished silver.
meanings.sent5: The unciliated glass was so clear, it seemed invisible.

meanings.sent1: The unciliated caterpillar moved smoothly along the branch.
meanings.sent2: The unciliated surface of the leaf was flat.
meanings.sent3: The unciliated brush glided effortlessly through her hair.
meanings.sent4: The unciliated road stretched out ahead like a smooth ribbon.
meanings.sent5: The unciliated doll's head was perfectly round and smooth.

meanings.sent1: The unciliated tissue lacked the usual movement.
meanings.sent2: The unciliated area of the body remained still.
meanings.sent3: The unciliated pond was eerily calm.
meanings.sent4: The unciliated river flowed silently through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The unciliated air in the room felt stagnant and heavy.
